summary: Blur is an English rock band formed in 1988. Their music changed over time, from Madchester and shoegaze to Britpop, and later to electronic and art rock. They achieved great popularity in the UK and had a famous rivalry with Oasis in the 1990s. With their album "Blur" in 1997, they found success in the US too. After a break, they reunited in 2009 and continue to make music and tour. Their latest album, "The Ballad of Darren," came out in 2023.
title: Blur (band)
